text: Hofen was a municipality in the canton of Schaffhausen in Switzerland. It is on the border with Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg in Germany. On 1 January 2009, the former municipalities of Hofen, Altdorf, Bibern and Opfertshofen merged into the municipality of Thayngen. ==Other websites== * Map of Hofen, Schaffhausen, Switzerland from Google Maps Category:Former municipalities of Schaffhausen
title: Hofen, Switzerland
